description.value:
You see now; you understand. Your powers come with a price, and your fate is not your own. You're a part of something greaterâ€”a pawn in motion within a vast and complex pattern, executing commands long planned and twice foreseen. You're beholden to a higher power, and it has plans for you.

If your innate spells are divine, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Divine Decree] once per day as a 7th-rank divine innate spell.

If your innate spells are occult, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Warp Mind] once per day as a 7th-rank occult innate spell.
